verbs.description: as [ARG1: lobster population] [V: shifts] [ARGM-DIR: north] connecticut industry struggles the lobster population has crashed to the lowest levels on record in southern new england while climbing to heights never before seen in the cold waters off maine and other northern reaches virginia institute of marine science jason mcnamee aquidneck island atlantic states marine fisheries commission gulf of maine research institute of portland atlantic states commission lobster portland cape cod massachusetts division of marine fisheries long island sound
